t: Restrict or block product categories and items with buying policies - Amazon Customer Service
s: Administrators can use buying policies to restrict purchases of certain product categories and items. Accounts with Business Prime Enterprise can also block purchases from certain product categories and items.

t: Current List of Amazon Gated & Restricted Brands - The Selling Guys
s: January 2, 2025 - Amazon will still let you list certain brands, however, the actual brand owners can still take legal action against you. This gray area is where a lot of sellers are getting caught out, resulting in their Amazon account being blocked or suspended.

t: How to Get Approved to Sell Restricted Brands on Amazon - Full-Time FBA
s: January 15, 2025 - You might be ungated in a main category but gated in a subcategory. You would need to get approval for the subcategory before you can sell items within that subcategory. One example is that you might be approved to sell in Toys & Games, but not approved for Building Block Toys or Learning Game Toys.

I report the violation, and I get my listing blocked, and I am blocked and they sent email to me to retract my complaint against myself!!

t: Amazon blocked 10 billion listings in counterfeit crackdown
s: Amazon, which has been under pressure from shoppers, brands and lawmakers to crack down on counterfeits on its site, said Monday that it blocked more than 10 billion suspected phony listings last year before any of their offerings could be sold.

t: Amazon blocked 10 billion counterfeit listings and spent $700M fighting fraud on its site last year – GeekWire
s: May 11, 2021 - As part of a continued effort to show that it’s serious about cracking down on counterfeit goods sold on its platform, Amazon said Monday that it blocked more than 10 billion suspected bad listings before they were published in its stores last year.
